entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Malahat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:13 AM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Malahat 08:00 AM PST Sunday 12 February 2023
Temperature: 3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 82 %
Dewpoint: 0.6°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this morning. Periods of rain beginning this morning. High 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending after midnight then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h late this evening except west 70 near Juan de Fuca Strait late this evening and overnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 70%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers early in the morning. 70 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 near Juan de Fuca Strait late in the afternoon. High 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 12 February 2023
